author: kwright
msg: Change Lucene Connectors Framework to Apache Connectors Framework, wherever it appears in the software or support files themselves.  Note that I've made no attempt to change package paths or class names or war/jar file names that include 'lcf' in this pass - I suspect that it will be OK to leave these, but currently unsure.  Also, the logo will need to change too.
